Title: Averages of Eigenfunctions Over Hypersurfaces
Abstract: © 2018, Springer-Verlag GmbH Germany, part of Springer Nature.Let (M, g) be a compact, smooth, Riemannian manifold and { ϕh} an L2-normalized sequence of Laplace eigenfunctions with defect measure μ. Let H be a smooth hypersurface with unit exterior normal ν. Our main result says that when μ is not concentrated conormally to H, the eigenfunction restrictions to H satisfy∫HϕhdσH=o(1)and∫HhDνϕhdσH=o(1),h→ 0 +.
